rows.label: tlk41300012_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I have an acquaintance
named Zosimo, a highly
skilled mercenary, but...

rows.label: tlk41300012_01_msg0002
rows.name:
He loves sweets...
especially Nopopon Rolls.

rows.label: tlk41300012_01_msg0003
rows.name:
He says that eating one gets him
fired up, and he's in better shape
than usual during a fight.

rows.label: tlk41300012_01_msg0004
rows.name:
My wife, on the other hand,
loves Fower Perfume.

rows.label: tlk41300012_01_msg0005
rows.name:
She says a nice scent helps
her focus on her work.

rows.label: tlk41300012_01_msg0006
rows.name:
You should try to find an item
you like, too. I bet you'll be
in better shape than usual.
